scene_description_enriched: Within a circular frame, a centaur, a mythical creature with the upper body of a human and the lower body of a horse, is depicted drawing a bow and arrow. The centaur has a human torso with arms extended, aiming the bow. Its lower body is that of a brown horse, with four legs. The background is a landscape with rolling green hills, scattered trees, and a blue sky with distant mountains. The scene is framed by an ornamental border typical of medieval manuscripts, featuring floral motifs and gold leaf.
